cause.description:
the wholesale slaughter of veggies has reached epic proportions! the growing conditions of these poor defenseless living things is beyond horrific! over-crowded, force-fed artficial nutrients to make them grow faster & stronger, sprayed with toxic chemicals to prevent insects & other such natural occurances!
millions of the veggies die each & everyday for the consumption by people. they are alive & deserve our respect & protection!
1. Veggies are living beings
cause.name: People for the Ethical Treatment of Vegetables
